DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the patient has had any history of documented congestive heart failure (CHF).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: a history or background regarding congestive heart failure (CHF).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A complication of HEART DISEASES. Defective cardiac filling and/or impaired contraction and emptying, resulting in the heart's inability to pump a sufficient amount of blood to meet the needs of the body tissues or to be able to do so only with an elevated filling pressure. (from Braunwald, Heart Disease, 5th ed)

Concepts.definition: Failure of the heart to pump a sufficient amount of blood to meet the needs of the body tissues, resulting in tissue congestion and edema. Signs and symptoms include shortness of breath, pitting edema, enlarged tender liver, engorged neck veins, and pulmonary rales.

Property.preferredDefinition: An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever been treated for heart failure

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any congestive heart failure medical complications

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a documented history of congestive heart failure requiring chronic medical therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known history of congestive heart failure or cardiac ejection fraction <50% (or less than institutional normal limits)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient experiencing symptoms of congestive heart failure?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have symptomatic congestive heart failure?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient known to have congestive heart failure

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have New York Heart Association (NYHA) Grade II or greater congestive heart failure?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have documented New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class III or IV congestive heart failure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of documented CHF defined as symptomatic heart failure with an LVEF less than 40%?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have symptoms of congestive heart failure?
